Package com.noctarius.borabora.builder.encoder

This package contains the builder classes to encode values into CBOR data items.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DictionaryBuilder<B>
    The DictionaryBuilder interface is used to create dictionary entries (key-value pairs) in the generated CBOR stream.
    DictionaryEntryBuilder<B>
    The DictionaryEntryBuilder interface is used to create a dictionary entry (a single key-value pair) in the generated CBOR stream.
    GraphBuilder
    The GraphBuilder interface defines the entry and exit point for generating a CBOR encoded stream.
    IndefiniteStringBuilder<B>
    The IndefiniteStringBuilder interface is used to create a string that consists of an indefinite number of independent strings.
    SequenceBuilder<B>
    The SequenceBuilder interface is used to create sequence (array) elements in the generated CBOR stream.
    ValueBuilder<B>
    The ValueBuilder interface defines most of the basic write methods used to insert values into a CBOR encoded stream using the fluent builder API.

Package com.noctarius.borabora.builder.encoder Description

This package contains the builder classes to encode values into CBOR data items. Provided classes have builtin support for all common CBOR data types and the out of the box provided semantic tag types. Anyhow com.noctarius.borabora.builder.encoder provides semantic tag builders for all supported semantic tag types for the ValueBuilder.putTag(com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder.TagBuilderConsumer) SPI.
